price: ወደዚያ ከማንኛውም ነገር አላህ ወደ ፈጠረው ጥላዎቹ እነርሱ የተዋረዱ ሲኾኑ ለአላህ ሰጋጆች ኾነው ከቀኝና ከግራዎች ወደሚዛወሩት አላዩምን?
arabic: أَوَلَمۡ يَرَوۡاْ إِلَىٰ مَا خَلَقَ ٱللَّهُ مِن شَيۡءٖ يَتَفَيَّؤُاْ ظِلَٰلُهُۥ عَنِ ٱلۡيَمِينِ وَٱلشَّمَآئِلِ سُجَّدٗا لِّلَّهِ وَهُمۡ دَٰخِرُونَ

version.title: Amharic translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Amharic by Muhammad Sadeq and Muhammad Ath-Thany Habib. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: awalam yaraw ilā mā khalaqa al-lahu min shayin yatafayya-u ẓilāluhu ʿani al-yamīni wal-shamāili sujjadan lillahi wahum dākhirūna
